metadata.title: Archives of Virology Single Radial Haemolysis for the Determination of Antibody to Reoviruses Brief Report

abstract.original_text: A single radial haemolysis (SRH) for reovirus antibody determination was developed and compared to standard haemagglutination-inhibition (HI) and complement fixation (CF) techniques. SRH appeared more simple and sensitive than CF, but less sensitive and less specific than HI.

sentences.segment_text: A single radial haemolysis ( SRH ) for reovirus antibody determination was developed and compared to standard haemagglutination-inhibition ( HI ) and complement fixation ( CF ) techniques .
SRH appeared more simple and sensitive than CF ,
but less sensitive and less specific than HI .
